Package org.group7.model.entities.powerups.handlers

Interface IBasePowerUpHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
Board
public interface IBasePowerUpHandler

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addPiece(Piece p, int index)
    Inserts a given piece at a specified index in the field.
    void
    pieceFromBaseToField(Color color, int i)
    The function moves a piece from a specific base (based on the color) to the field using the int i (which should be 1, or customisable based on the dice roll).
    void
    removePowerUpFromField(PowerUp powerUp)
    Removes a power-up entity from a specific position on the field.

  • Method Details

    • addPiece

      void addPiece(Piece p, int index)
      Inserts a given piece at a specified index in the field.
      Parameters:
      p - The parameter "p" is of type Piece, which represents a game piece that can be added to the field.
      index - The index parameter represents the position in the field array where the piece should be added.

    • removePowerUpFromField

      void removePowerUpFromField(PowerUp powerUp)
      Removes a power-up entity from a specific position on the field.
      Parameters:
      powerUp - The powerUp parameter is an instance of the PowerUp class.

    • pieceFromBaseToField

      void pieceFromBaseToField(Color color, int i)
      The function moves a piece from a specific base (based on the color) to the field using the int i (which should be 1, or customisable based on the dice roll).
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the player's pieces (e.g., Color.RED or Color.BLUE).
      i - Represents the number rolled on a dice or can be hard-coded to 1. It is used to determine the destination field for the piece being moved from the base.
